name: The Last Job (TonyA310)
description:
The Last Job

WASD  to move   

Move mouse to look around

Right click to  talk  to  character  

You're a  corrupt police officer and you have one last  job assignment  from your boss.  Steal  an artifact from the museum  and escape through the city  without  getting caught. Can the corrupt  police officer pull off one last job? 

Your name  is Frank  Matthews the  corrupt police officer
